page.description: The additional resource files allows you to specify the names of any additional resource files. These are files in the Web Project folder that you want to ensure get published every time you publish the UX component.

section.description: If this component has been specified as the 'initial' component in a Cordova project, the additional resource files are automatically copied into the Cordova project built using Cordova CLI or Ionic Appflow. The files entered into this list must be in the form of a cr-lf list of relative filenames (relative to the Web Project folder).
